ar.com.hjg.pngj.nosandbox
Class FileHelper

java.lang.Object
  ar.com.hjg.pngj.nosandbox.FileHelper

public class FileHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Several static utility methods related with PngReader/PngWriter that uses the filesystem.

This is ont essential to the PNGJ library, and will not be available in sandboxed environments (eg. Google app engine)
